import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, OnInit, Output } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent { data = {}; email : string = ''; password : string = ''; loginUser(){ console.log(this.email); alert(this.email); } }
